event QuestCanceled(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId)
event QuestCompleted(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId)
event QuestReward(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId, address rewardItem, uint256 itemQuantity)
event QuestSkillUp(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId, uint8 profession, uint64 skillUp)
event QuestStaminaSpent(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId, uint256 staminaFullAt, uint16 staminaSpent)
event QuestStarted(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId)
event QuestXP(uint256 indexed questId, address indexed player, uint256 heroId, uint64 xpEarned)
event RoleAdminChanged(bytes32 indexed role, bytes32 indexed previousAdminRole, bytes32 indexed newAdminRole)
event RoleGranted(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
event RoleRevoked(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
function extractNumber(uint256 randomNumber, uint256 digits, uint256 offset) pure returns (uint256 result)
function hasRole(bytes32 role, address account) view returns (bool)

function rewardItems(uint256) view returns (address item, int64 expBonus, int64 skillUpChance, int64 smallSkillUpMod, int64 mediumSkillUpMod, int64 largeSkillUpMod, int64 baseChance, int64 skillMod, int64 statMod, int64 luckMod)

function setRewardItem(uint256 _id, tuple(address item, int64 expBonus, int64 skillUpChance, int64 smallSkillUpMod, int64 mediumSkillUpMod, int64 largeSkillUpMod, int64 baseChance, int64 skillMod, int64 statMod, int64 luckMod) _item)
function vrf(uint256 blockNumber) view returns (bytes32 result)
